0xAB7F7241.name: ADD_CONVAR_CHANGE_LISTENER

params.name: conVarFilter
params.description: The Console Variable to listen for, this can be a pattern like "test:\*", or null for any

0xAB7F7241.description:
Adds a listener for Console Variable changes.

The function called expects to match the following signature:

```ts
function ConVarChangeListener(conVarName: string, reserved: any);
```

*   **conVarName**: The ConVar that changed.
*   **reserved**: Currently unused.
0xAB7F7241.resultsDescription: A cookie to remove the change handler.
